page.content:
County Handicap Hurdle Race Card

The County Handicap Hurdle is the second race on the card on the final day of the Cheltenham Festival and it is an exciting race for punters to enjoy and sink their teeth into. The Race Card will be fully comprehensive and will include the odds and betting for each runner as well as well as form line for the main contenders. Punters will also be able to follow their bet by checking out the connections and colours for each of the entries.

County Handicap Hurdle Race Card
